entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW AND RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

entry.em: WEDNESDAY NIGHT AND NEW YEARS DAY
entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
